Articles.Content: I was in the Mun orbit and my orbital recycling station had a scanner for ore. I scanned then decoupled a lander but resource overlay in the map view remained. Is there a way to disable it from the lande (where I don't have the scanner)? Some hotkey maybe? Or the only way to disable it is to switch back to the vessel with a scanned and disable it there?
Go to map view, focus on Mun and the buttons on the right side of the screen will allow you to turn overlay on and off.

Go to map view, focus on Mun and the buttons on the right side of the screen will allow you to turn overlay on and off.

And if you're not sure what to press, its the resource button first, then clicking on the resource name is what toggles the overlay.
